about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the underground world of "Nakamers: The Escape," a platformer game that will take you on a challenging adventure. After a collapse shakes the underground civilization of the Dékumas, you step into the shoes of Xioon, a daring protagonist in search of his lost family. Explore 8 unique levels, collect mengues, and overcome obstacles to ensure the safety of your loved ones. Nanite and Lumen technology from Unreal Engine 5 implemented.

Game Features:

- Exploration and Platforming: Face traps, enemies, and obstacles in underground environments full of challenges. Each level offers a unique experience that will test your platforming skills, with gameplay mixing extremely precise platforming sections and exciting escape moments.

- Mengue Collection: Collect mengues, the gems representing your lives. Each time you die, you lose one, and if you run out of mengues, your game will be erased regardless of the level you’re on. Every mengue counts!

- Hidden Items and Secondary Paths: Meticulously explore each level to find hidden items and secondary paths with additional mengues. Certain hidden items unlock a secondary ending and an extra level. Find them all!

- Time Trial Mode: For players seeking an additional challenge, the time trial mode allows you to compete against the clock and hone your skills. Can you beat your own records and those of other players?

- Dramatic Story: Immerse yourself in an emotional narrative as you help Xioon overcome adversities and discover the truth behind the collapse. The story will take you on a journey filled with mystery and hope. For players who enjoy the historical context of the Dékuma, they can take their time in the Maktaba to learn about their castes, gods, customs, and legends.

- Challenges and Replayability: With a variety of challenges and hidden secrets, "Nakamers: The Escape" will keep you entertained and motivated to improve your skills and uncover everything the underground world has to offer.

Are you ready to face the dangers of the underground and save your family? Join Xioon in "Nakamers: The Escape" and prove your courage and skill in this unforgettable adventure!

highlighted.name: El dolor en la gran Maktaba
El trágico final de Xioon y su mujer

name: Nakamers: La huida

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz 2.80 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1070
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Escapa del colapso de una civilización que está a punto de extinguirse. Acompaña a Xioon en busca de su familia perdida mientras intentas ponerte a salvo de los desprendimientos y sorteando los ríos de lava. Sumérgete en una historia épica llena de emociones.
supported_languages:
Spanish - Spain*, English
*languages with full audio support
